item.description:
Ok so regular season is about to start. We decided to do a little promotion for all cheese heads if they fancy watching the game together. Where going to be having $2 draft special as well as free food on the night. Don't forget its a private function room for all packers fans with 3 hd plasma tv's as well as a private bar and toilet. What more could fans ask for?

Come along and support your team with fellow fans!

group.name: The Boston Green Bay Packers Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Green Bay Packers August Meetup
